meanings.sent1: I always try to outthank my friends for their help.
meanings.sent2: She will outthank her teacher for the extra support.
meanings.sent3: The children decided to outthank their parents by making them breakfast in bed.
meanings.sent4: His heartfelt thank you note outthanked all the others.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to outthank the local heroes with a parade.

meanings.definition: To show more gratitude than someone else.
meanings.sent1: I want to outthank my sister for her kindness.
meanings.sent2: They always outthank each other with thoughtful gestures.
meanings.sent3: The competition was fierce as each team tried to outthank the other.
meanings.sent4: Her smile outthanked any words she could say.
meanings.sent5: The students decided to outthank their teacher with a surprise party.
